pullRequest.title: TRUNK-5115: Replace use of conditional logging with slf4j parameterized messages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of what i changed.
Replace use of conditional logging with slf4j parameterized messages
Issue worked on:
https://issues.openmrs.org/browse/TRUNK-5115

nodes.bodyText: Logger message should be the same . It should display the both concept id and locale . With your change it will log only the locale information
I don't see the new parameter used anywhere so my suggestion is to remove this and also seems this is the reason behind the build failure since the object param does not have a type.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -641,20 +641,20 @@ private ConceptName getNameInLocale(Locale locale) {
 	 * Returns the name which is explicitly marked as preferred for a given locale.
 	 * 
 	 * @param forLocale locale for which to return a preferred name
+	 * @param  
 	 * @return preferred name for the locale, or null if no preferred name is specified
 	 * @should return the concept name explicitly marked as locale preferred
 	 * @should return the fully specified name if no name is explicitly marked as locale preferred
 	 */
-	public ConceptName getPreferredName(Locale forLocale) {
+	public ConceptName getPreferredName(Locale forLocale, object ) {

nodes.bodyText: I don't see the variable forconceptId declared and initialized.
